meaning: transmit, go along, walk along, follow, report, communicate, legend, tradition

onyomiExamples.meaning: legend, tradition, biography, life, method, way, horseback transportation and communication relay system used in ancient Japan
long-distance relay race, stagecoach, post horse
tuning peg (on a biwa or shamisen)

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to be handed down, to be introduced, to be transmitted, to be circulated, to go along, to walk along
to convey, to report, to transmit, to communicate, to tell, to impart, to propagate, to teach, to bequeath
to go along, to walk along, to follow
means of making contact, intermediary, go-between, connections, influence, pull, good offices
verbal message, word (from someone), rumour, rumor
